column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: ------ An immigration police operation took place at 10:00 am on December 17
column7: Phnom Penh.------154 foreigners (12 women)  from Vietnam and China were checked.------– 119 Vietnamese (12 women)------– 35 Chinese.------51 Vietnamese and 3 Chinese were found to eithrer have no work permit or passport/visa and were sent to the Immigration Department for further procedures. PP POLICE
